name: Pestilence Away
description:
Pestilence Away is microgame done as part of university project. Aimed at minimal interaction resource management in the same vein as game's like Reign.

-------------

Welcome to Pestilence Away! 

In this game, you play as the ruler of the land and a great Plague has come to devastate your peaceful growth as civilization. Have none of it, make the right choices and succeed through hardship!

Win condition is simple: Reach full cure meter before the Plague meter fills! If the Plague meter fills you loose, even if your cure meter filled at the same time! 

The game works in intervals of 30 seconds divided into 4 smaller intervals. Every small interval, the meters are updated based on rates of infection/research. And you may also face a mini-event which will affect your statistics based on your previous choices and performance. Every 30 seconds you get to make a choice with a more drastic effect!

All game files are available freely, along with free Asset usage crediting at https://github.com/N3verm0re/dj2d_mj1
